title: About GenFree Network
mission: To create a loving community where believers can grow in faith, fellowship, and service to God and others.
vision: To be a beacon of hope and love in our community, spreading the gospel through authentic relationships and meaningful worship.

values.title: Faith
values.description: We believe in the transformative power of faith in Jesus Christ.

values.title: Community
values.description: We value authentic relationships and genuine fellowship among believers.

values.title: Service
values.description: We are committed to serving God and our community with love and humility.

values.title: Growth
values.description: We encourage continuous spiritual growth and learning in God's word.

team.name: Pastor John Smith
team.bio: Pastor John has been serving the community for over 15 years, bringing wisdom and compassion to his ministry.

team.name: Sarah Johnson
team.bio: Sarah leads our worship team with passion and dedication, creating an atmosphere of authentic praise.
